casebody.data:
Jennifer RICKERSON, Roxanne Diggs, Joseph Rounds, Desaray Joseph, Jenisha Rounds, and the Estate of Joseph Triggs, individually and on behalf of Joseph Triggs, Deceased
v.
AUDUBON HEALTH & REHABILITATION CENTER a/k/a Community Care Center of Thibodaux, LLC d/b/a Audubon Health & Rehab and Audubon Health & Rehabilitation Center NO. 2018-C-0118 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 23, 2018

Denied.

JOHNSON, C.J., would grant and docket.

HUGHES, J., would grant and docket.

GENOVESE, J., would grant and docket.
